title: League Sign In Not Authenticating
body:
I was on the league client about to play with a couple friends, my friend and I mystery gifted each other and I never got my skin, so I decided to re-login to see if I would get the notification. When I attempted to relog, it got stuck on the login screen with the login status at Authenticating... I tried restarting my computer, restarting my modem, repairing the game and even uninstalling and re-installing league. None of these did anything because I am still trying to log in, but I keep getting stuck at the Authenticating part. 

P.S.  My friends are also able to see that I'm online, even though I'm stuck on the Authenticating page and can't see the actual client

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it looks like you might have been kicked around the time that the new patch came out. It also seems like you were finally able to get logged in, but let me know if that wasn't you and you still can't get logged back in!

Having a similar issue, just with the difference, that I usually can log in after rebooting.

But after some time, if I log off and back on again, I am stuck in the authenticating-page.

Tried several things, from disabling my firewall (temporarily) to new installation and hextech repair-tool. nothing worked, it just randomly disallows me to authenticate and after  a complete reboot, I am able to log in again. 

Happend / happens to me since the latest update.
